name: Finder (itch)
description:
"Love is blind". So I decided to do an Tinder clone, where you have to check if the profile is real or fake, so you don't just follow the profile blind. You'll also have the ability to create your own Profile in my game. I wish you a lot of fun with it!

Changelog: I changed a few profiles because it was hard to tell from some profiles if they are fake or not
